mapper.update: update T_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND+#{transFund} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accIn}
update T_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND-#{transFund} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accOut}
mapper.insert: insert into T_TRANSFER(deal_no, deal_date, trans_type, trans_status, acc_out, acc_outname, acc_outbank, acc_in, acc_inname, acc_inbank, currency, trans_fund, kind) values(sys_guid(),#{dealDate},#{transType},#{transStatus},#{accOut},#{accOutName},#{accOutBank},#{accIn}, #{accInName},#{accInBank},#{currency},#{transFund},#{kind})
mapper.select: select ACC_FUND from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo}
select BANK_NAME from T_BANK where BANKID=(select ACC_BANKID from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
select USER_NAME from T_USER where USER_ID=(select USER_ID from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
